_xResult.title: Linas Linen Apron Dress
_xResult.shortdesc: Custom made linen maxi dress with side slits
_xResult.longdesc:
A custom made dress MADE for layering. With its long side slits, the Lina apron dress by Shantima is perfect not just for a pair of leggings, but also for a maxi skirt if you so please. And since it's a solid color, you can go wild with underlaid patterns and colors!

 

The two long straps allow you to wear this dress in three different ways. Along with its ultra flattering A-line silhouette and deep side pockets, this dress is one of the most comfortable and convenient things you can get yourself into. 

 

The 'Linas' apron dress is made of 100% linen in a medium weight fabric and comes pre-washed and softened so it will shrink no more! It's also available in 31 different colors, which you can choose from the color palette in the last image. Remember to mention your color preference during checkout! The color in these pictures is Dried Herb Green (13). You may also customize its length during checkout if, for instance, you want it to be knee length instead! 

 

Shantima uses Oeko-Tex certified 100% European linen fabrics which guarantees that it meets human - ecological requirements.

properties.propvalue: Gentle machine wash on low temperatures with soft washing agents. Machine drying in the most gentle way, please use cool temperature. Avoid overdrying.  No ironing required to maintain relaxed and wrinkled texture.
